ca.nejedly.mail.imap
Class GotMail

java.lang.Object
  ca.nejedly.mail.imap.GotMail
public class GotMail
extends java.lang.Object

Checks the user's inbox and returns information about user's messages.

Author:
Zdenek Nejedly znejedly@uoguelph.ca
See Also:
GotMailVO

Method Detail

checkMail

public GotMailVO checkMail(java.lang.String mailServer,
                           int port,
                           java.lang.String uid,
                           java.lang.String pwd,
                           boolean retrieveCountsOnly)
                    throws GotMailException,
                           GotMailLoginFailedException,
                           GotMailMissingUidException,
                           GotMailMissingPasswordException
Parameters:
mailServer - domain address of the IMAP mail server
port - communication port of the IMAP server
uid - user's login name
pwd - user's password
retrieveCountsOnly - if this parameter is true then only the number of unseen messages and the total message count is queried without opening the folder (no other message info retrieved). Full folder scan performed otherwised.
Returns:
value object with the message counts and optional message info (subject, etc) depending on the retrieveCountsOnly parameter.
Throws:
GotMailException
GotMailLoginFailedException
GotMailMissingUidException
GotMailMissingPasswordException

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
For testing only

Parameters:
args - the command line arguments
